snippet.title: Cave Buster - Make your way through fiery caverns and alien fauna, find the burger and eat it!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://jontopielski.itch.io/cave-buster?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Play as a little alien guy who crash landed into the core of a dangerous planet.  Make your way through fiery caverns and alien fauna.  Find the super duper Burger and eat it!

➡️ More from Jon Topielski https://jontopielski.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More 2D platformers https://itch.io/games/genre-platformer?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
